import React from 'react' import img from './../profile.jpg' import ReactBootstrap, {Carousel} from 'react-bootstrap' import { Component } from 'react' function ControlledCarousel() { const [index, setIndex] = useState(0); const [direction, setDirection] = useState(null); const handleSelect = (selectedIndex, e) => { setIndex(selectedIndex); setDirection(e.direction); }; } class projectpage extends Component{ render(){ return(

) } } export default projectpage
